SECTION: 1. EntraID std usr properties

- General:: Scope: | Entra ID required standard user properties with naming conventions: Users (internal)
- General:: Notes:
- General:: Property | Entra ID required standard user properties with naming conventions: Convention
- General:: First name | Entra ID required standard user properties with naming conventions: <first name>
- General:: Last name | Entra ID required standard user properties with naming conventions: <last name>
- General:: Display name | Entra ID required standard user properties with naming conventions: <first name> <last name>
- General:: User Principal Name | Entra ID required standard user properties with naming conventions: <first letter of first name><last name>@contoso.com
- General:: Email | Entra ID required standard user properties with naming conventions: <first letter of first name><last name>@contoso.com
- General:: Manager | Entra ID required standard user properties with naming conventions: (manager pick list)
- General:: Job title | Entra ID required standard user properties with naming conventions: <job title>
- General:: Department | Entra ID required standard user properties with naming conventions: >> 2. EntraID fixed usr properties
- General:: Office location | Entra ID required standard user properties with naming conventions: >> 2. EntraID fixed usr properties
- General:: Country or region | Entra ID required standard user properties with naming conventions: >> 2. EntraID fixed usr properties
- General:: Company name | Entra ID required standard user properties with naming conventions: >> 2. EntraID fixed usr properties
- General:: Employee type | Entra ID required standard user properties with naming conventions: >> 2. EntraID fixed usr properties
- General:: Employee hire date | Entra ID required standard user properties with naming conventions: (date pick list in Entra ID)
- General:: Employee ID | Entra ID required standard user properties with naming conventions: <payroll id>

SECTION: 3. Groups naming conventions

- General:: Scope: | Naming conventions for groups, including security groups in Entra ID: Groups in Entra ID
- General:: Notes:
- General:: Type | Naming conventions for groups, including security groups in Entra ID: Context
- General:: Security | Naming conventions for groups, including security groups in Entra ID: General

- General:: Security | Naming conventions for groups, including security groups in Entra ID: Dynamic: Department
- General:: Security | Naming conventions for groups, including security groups in Entra ID: Dynamic: Company

- General:: Security | Naming conventions for groups, including security groups in Entra ID: Dynamic: Intune Devices
- General:: Security | Naming conventions for groups, including security groups in Entra ID: Enterprise Apps Assignment
- General:: Security | Naming conventions for groups, including security groups in Entra ID: Intune Apps User Assignment
- General:: Security | Naming conventions for groups, including security groups in Entra ID: Intune Apps Device Assignment
- General:: Security | Naming conventions for groups, including security groups in Entra ID: License Assignment

SECTION: 4. Admins naming conventions

- General:: Scope: | Naming conventions for Administrators of the M365 tenant, including Global Administrators: Administrators with elevated privileges
- General:: Notes: | Naming conventions for Administrators of the M365 tenant, including Global Administrators: If any user requires one or more of the Admin roles below, they need to have a dedicated admin account separate from their own personal employee account.
- General:: Admin Role | Naming conventions for Administrators of the M365 tenant, including Global Administrators: Convention
- General:: Global Administrator | Naming conventions for Administrators of the M365 tenant, including Global Administrators: adm_<username>@contoso.com
- General:: Security Administrator | Naming conventions for Administrators of the M365 tenant, including Global Administrators: adm_<username>@contoso.com
- General:: Exchange Administrator | Naming conventions for Administrators of the M365 tenant, including Global Administrators: adm_<username>@contoso.com
- General:: Intune Administrator | Naming conventions for Administrators of the M365 tenant, including Global Administrators: adm_<username>@contoso.com
- General:: SharePoint Administrator | Naming conventions for Administrators of the M365 tenant, including Global Administrators: adm_<username>@contoso.com
- General:: Teams Administrator | Naming conventions for Administrators of the M365 tenant, including Global Administrators: adm_<username>@contoso.com
- General:: Conditional Access Administrator | Naming conventions for Administrators of the M365 tenant, including Global Administrators: adm_<username>@contoso.com
- General:: Application Administrator | Naming conventions for Administrators of the M365 tenant, including Global Administrators: adm_<username>@contoso.com
- Naming conventions for Administrators of the M365 tenant, including Global Administrators: `

SECTION: 5. Exchange auto-away templates

- Auto-Away Type: Internal | Message: [Employee Name] is no longer with Contoso. For assistance regarding ongoing projects or internal matters, please contact [Manager Name] at [Manager Email].
- Auto-Away Type: External | Message: Thank you for your message. [Employee Name] is no longer with Contoso. Please direct all future correspondence to [Manager Name] at [Manager Email], who will be able to assist you.

SECTION: 6. Computers naming conventions

- General:: Scope: | Computers naming conventions: All end user computers including laptops
- General:: Notes:
- General:: Computer Type | Computers naming conventions: Naming convention
- General:: End user Computers/Laptops | Computers naming conventions: <Serial#>
